abstract: ` x-files ' fan-favorite returns from the dead ... kinda .
article: the lone gunmen are back ... well , kinda . on wednesday 's x-files , richard langly , who was one of the three conspiracy theorists/hackers who assisted mulder throughout the years . the lone gunmen died saving the world from bio-terrorists back in season nine . so it was surprising when langly contacted mulder on his phone . although langly was n't really alive , he helped create a digital world where his mind survived . `` mulder , it 's like i designed heaven , '' langly said while communicating through mulder 's phone , `` i eat hot dogs and donuts all day long .

no one here ever dies of cancer or alzheimer 's . and the ramones are here , and they do n't fight ! '' unfortunately , it was n't all sunshine and rainbows for langley , who wanted mulder and scully to shutdown the simulation . langly told them , `` we 're living a lie here . it 's a work camp . we 're digital slaves . they take our uploaded minds to develop science that only the elite will use to leave your world . `` so mulder and scully snuck into a government building , shut down the servers , and ended the program .

but this is the x-files , so , of course , it was n't going to end so easily . langly reappeared on mulder 's phone in a panic , telling them , `` they know that we know ! destroy the backup ! mulder , i 'm afraid , '' before disappearing . we 'll just have to wait to find out if mulder and scully can end the simulation for good . the x-files airs wednesdays at 8 p. m. on fox . watch clips and full episodes of the x-files for free on yahoo view . see why x-files fans freaked out on twitter after the truth behind scully 's son was revealed : tell us what you think !
hit us up on twitter , facebook , or instagram , or leave your comments below . and check out our host , kylie mar , on twitter , facebook , or instagram .
